title: Ryzen 3 3300X, 3100 Review With Benchmarks and Performance - The BEST Budget CPUs!
description: The AMD Ryzen 3 3300X and Ryzen 3 3100 have awesome performance for their price which makes them each the best CPU for gaming in the budget category yet! But they aren't perfect for everyone since B550 motherboard compatibility has limits and that might mean the Ryzen 5 1600 AF can step in.     Buy items in this video from Amazon & Other partners at the links below:  Ryzen 3 3300X - Coming soonish Ryzen 3 3100 - Coming soonish Ryzen 5 1600AF -     Ryzen 5 3600 -       Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by AMD. This video is not sponsored. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #ryzen33300x #ryzen33100 #hardwarecanucks
